title: EJ Johnson dresses up as Paris Hilton for her Halloween party
text:
Socialite EJ Johnson dressed up as Paris Hilton herself when he attended her Halloween bash at her home on Thursday night.

The 27-year-old son of Magic Johnson wore a sheer pink dressing gown with furry sleeves over a white pair of shorts.

When he was pictured leaving the party, he went barefoot and shielded his face with a turquoise Hermes bag, the star's arm candy of choice.

Spot the difference: EJ Johnson dressed up as Paris Hilton in a sheer pink fluffy dressing gown and was pictured leaving the socialite's Halloween party barefoot on Thursday evening

The Rich Kids of Beverly Hills star wore a glossy pink wig, held in place with a hairslide and added some razzle dazzle with a diamanté choker.

A host of other stars were in attendance on the night, including Kim Kardashian's best friend Larsa Pippen, 45, and supermodel Shanina Shaik, 28.

Shanina channelled Catherine Zeta-Jones in The Legend of Zorro in a corsetted white dress with a thigh-high split.

Bombshell: Paris looked incredible in a plunging looks and teased blonde locks at her party

So fetch: The Rich Kids of Beverly Hills star wore a glossy pink wig, held in place with a hairslide and added some razzle dazzle with a diamanté choker

The half Pakistani star added to the look with black ankle boots and a sleek choker necklace.

Jasmine Sanders showed off her modelesque figure in a tight black catsuit and red ribbon detailing.

Lots of the guests shared pictures of Paris, 38, on social media.

Hana Cross kept a low profile as she was seen arriving to the party in a pair of lace-up heels with her new beau Nasser Alfallah, 19.

The beauty opted for a white Native American outfit, complete with a feathered headdress.

The model's ex Brooklyn Beckham was seen arriving minutes after her which would no doubt have made for an awkward situation.
description: Socialite EJ Johnson dressed up as Paris Hilton herself when he attended her Halloween bash at her home on Thursday night.
